title: Text Photo: Make Your Pictures Readable, Literally
introduction: Text Photo is an app that converts pictures into unique typography artworks made of text. Users can choose from a variety of fonts, control parameters, input words, and utilize alpha channels for transparent backgrounds. The app supports multiple languages and offers post-processing effects.
features: Choose from over a thousand open fonts or provide your own TTF font
Control parameters to significantly change the output
Input up to 20 words for creating typography art
Utilize alpha channel for transparent backgrounds

faqs.question: What can Text Photo help with?
faqs.answer: Text Photo converts pictures into typography artworks made of text using selected fonts.

faqs.question: How many words can be input for creating typography art?
faqs.answer: Users can provide up to 20 words or a comma-separated list of words to create the artwork.

targetPeople: Users who want to create unique typography artworks from their pictures
